doc.after: Founded in 1899 by a group of Swiss, English and Catalan footballers led by Joan Gamper, the club has become a symbol of Catalan culture and Catalanism, hence the motto "MÃ©s que un club" (More than a club). Unlike many other football clubs, the supporters own and operate Barcelona. It is the world's second-richest football club in terms of revenue, with an annual turnover of â¬398 million. The club has a long-standing rivalry with Real Madrid; matches between the two teams are referred to as "El ClÃ¡sico".
